attributes.action: The government should set aside money to put towards UK Space Exploration.
attributes.background: Usa has given up the ghost as far as space exploration goes.  The UK needs to lead the way in space exploration, there's no excuse.  The reason why we are here is to evolve and the next step is to explore space.  We aren't born to work and pay tax, we are born to explore and develop our minds.

rejection.details:
The UK Government already funds UK Space Exploration. See for example: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/more-than-3m-invested-in-space-exploration

We're therefore not sure what further action you want the UK Government or Parliament to take. You could start a new petition asking for the UK Government to increase funding for UK Space Exploration, if that's what you want to happen.
